label: MajorIncident
name: Major ICT-Related Incident
classification_criteria: Number of clients affected; Duration; Geographic spread; Data loss; Criticality of services
reporting_obligation: Mandatory: Initial, Intermediate, and Final reports to Competent Authority
properties: Status: Actualized; Impact: High; Sector: Financial

label: MajorIncident
name: Operational Disruption
classification_criteria: System downtime exceeding recovery time objectives (RTO)
reporting_obligation: Required if critical function is impacted

label: MajorIncident
name: Data Breach
classification_criteria: Unauthorized access to or loss of confidential information
